verses.name: 2 Samuel 13:9
verses.text: And she took a pan, and poured them out before him; but he refused to eat. And Amnon said, Have out all men from me. And they went out every man from him.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 13:10
verses.text: And Amnon said unto Tamar, Bring the meat into the chamber, that I may eat of thine hand. And Tamar took the cakes which she had made, and brought them into the chamber to Amnon her brother.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 13:11
verses.text: And when she had brought them unto him to eat, he took hold of her, and said unto her, Come lie with me, my sister.
